title: DELETE_OBJECT
content:
0x539E0AE3E6634B9F0xD6EF9DA7// DeleteObject
void DELETE_OBJECT(Object* object);Parameters:object: The object you want to delete.Deletes the specified object.Note: If for some reason the entity won't delete, you might want to check if the object is a mission entity.NativeDB Introduced: v323Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local playerCoords = GetEntityCoords(playerPed)
local objectHash = GetHashKey("v_ret_gc_chair03")

local object = GetClosestObjectOfType(playerCoords, 10.0, objectHash, true, false, false)
if object == 0 then return end

-- If the object is a mission entity, we have to set it to false. Otherwise, it won't be possible to delete the object.
if IsEntityAMissionEntity(object) then
    SetEntityAsMissionEntity(object, false, true)
end

DeleteObject(object)
codeBlocks:
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local playerCoords = GetEntityCoords(playerPed)
local objectHash = GetHashKey("v_ret_gc_chair03")

local object = GetClosestObjectOfType(playerCoords, 10.0, objectHash, true, false, false)
if object == 0 then return end

-- If the object is a mission entity, we have to set it to false. Otherwise, it won't be possible to delete the object.
if IsEntityAMissionEntity(object) then
    SetEntityAsMissionEntity(object, false, true)
end

DeleteObject(object)
